name: Dice Face
description:
First entry into a game jam! Making a puzzle game (especially one this restrictive) was maybe a mistake... (it's hard to come up with puzzles!) but I don't regret at least trying! Only four levels so far.

Made in collaboration with my partner (she did most of the assets, I did most of the coding)

SkySeries Freebie used for the placeholder skybox

A couple of bugs still (mostly to do with collisions and the way the dice moves), but should be in a mostly playable state!
